name: Speed Dial Clone
description: This is a Firefox user stylesheet. This Speed Dial theme mimicks the look and feel of the (old) Firefox speed dial page. It is heavily based on subject to speed dial and Speed Dial Yama-Mod. For best optic, change the addon settings to: extensions.speeddial.enableGroups = false extensions.speeddial.heightModifierType = 1 extensions.speeddial.loadInNewTab = true extensions.speeddial.widthModifier = 200 extensions.speeddial.widthModifierType = 1
